channel.title: Imitation on My Art Gallery
channel.description: Recent content in Imitation on My Art Gallery

item.title: Moebius Artwork
item.description: I came to know about Moebius from my friend Jayanth. He encouraged me to draw one of his artwork. Moebius, a French artist, is known for his detailed artworks. The artwork above is referred from https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.openculture.com%2F2015%2F03%2Fmoebius-gives-18-wisdom-filled-tips-to-aspiring-artists-1996.html&psig=AOvVaw3q4PSE42MfWs-Bf5ueDkak&ust=1665323084349000&source=images&cd=vfe&ved=2ahUKEwivuqaI4tD6AhXWUWwGHS1RChMQjRx6BAgAEAs
